content:
The code chunk handles name uniquification for instances of `LerpFunctionNoStateInterval` when initializing with a custom name containing "%d", ensuring each instance has a unique identifier by replacing "%d" with an incrementing interval number.

# and uniquify the name for them.
            if "%d" in name:
                name = name % LerpFunctionNoStateInterval.lerpFunctionIntervalNum
                LerpFunctionNoStateInterval.lerpFunctionIntervalNum += 1
